claim: With more than 50% of the Welsh Rugby Union's turnover coming from money made from the men's home internationals, the apathy is starting to take its toll with the game in disarray on and off the field
article_title: Six Nations 2026: Wales 12-54 France - Les Bleus seal record win in Cardiff - BBC Sport
